name: Fish Tempura
method: Crack one egg and whisk until mixed well.
Add equivalent amount of sparking water, and add flour to get a thick mixture.
Heat up oil in the pan.
Dip the fillets in the created mixture and fry in the pan until golden/ready.
Serve with lemon on the side.

name: Chilli Salmon
method: Preheat the oven at 215°C.
Ensure the salmon piece is clean and free of bones.
Glaze the salmon with sweet chilli sauce to cover it.
Place the salmon on a baking tray over baking paper.
Bake for 15-25 minutes or until ready.
Serve with lemon on the side.

name: Asian Chicken
method: In a bowl, add a tiny bit of olive oil.
Add a couple of squeezes of honey.
Add soy sauce.
Add 3-5 drops of Worcestershire sauce.
Squeeze 4 garlic cloves and half ginger.
Add a tiny bit of mustard.
Add salt to taste.
Cut the chicken into cubes and add it to the mix.
Mix well.
Fry on a hot pan until chicken is cooked.
Optional: Garnish with spring onion and sesame.

name: BBQ Chicken
method: Dice up the chicken into small cubes and place in a bowl for marination.
Add olive oil, salt, black pepper, a little bit of cumin, and sweet red pepper.
Add chicken spice and herbs.
Optional: Add white wine vinegar.
Fry in a pan until cooked.

name: Chicken Over Rice
method: Dice up the onion, grate the carrot, and squeeze the garlic. Set aside (prep A).
Marinate the chicken with salt, black pepper, red pepper, olive oil, and white wine vinegar. Leave to marinate (prep B).
Cut red peppers into lengths and set aside (prep C).
Cut broccoli and cauliflower into small cubes and add peas and/or corn. Set aside (prep D).
Clean and prepare the rice.
Start cooking the rice. In another pan, add oil and cook prep A until the onion softens.
Add prep B to the pan and cook until the chicken is mostly cooked.
Add prep C to the pan. When the peppers become soft, add prep D and cook until everything is soft.
Add Nando's mild spice and sauce, and cook until hot.
Serve with rice on the side.

name: Spicy Chicken Stew
method: In a bowl, create the marinade by adding olive oil, salt, black pepper, 3 garlic cloves, white wine vinegar, chipotle paste, habanero spice, ketchup, chicken spice, and red pepper.
Dice the chicken into cubes and add it to the marinade.
In a heated pan, add half an onion and one grated carrot and cook until soft.
Add the chicken with the marinade to the pan.
Optional: Add grated or diced courgette and aubergine.
Add spring onion and parsley and cook until hot.

name: Tacos
method: Boil chicken until cooked and cool it down. Shred the chicken and add salt, black pepper, red pepper, chicken spice, and herbs. Alternatively, fry beef mince until cooked and add salt and black pepper.
Prepare the naan bread and cut it evenly into small circles.
Prepare the guacamole by mashing one avocado and adding a little lime juice and salt.
Prepare the pico de gallo by dicing tomatoes and red onion into cubes and adding parsley.
Cut lettuce into lengths.
Prepare sour cream or yogurt.
Prepare mozzarella cheese.
Assemble the tacos by adding the meat mix, pico de gallo, guacamole, sour cream, cheese, and lettuce. Gently grill the assembled tacos in a pan for a small decorative char.
Serve with limes, extra parsley, and (optional) mayonnaise drizzle on top of the tacos.

name: Fish Fingers
method: Cut the fish fillets into strips.
Dip each strip into flour, then in egg, and then breadcrumbs.
Deep fry the pieces until golden.
Serve with lemon on the side.

name: Milanesa chicken
method: Cut chicken into steak cuts
Dip each cut into flour, then egg, and then breadcrumbs
Preheat olive oil in a pan
Fry each steak cut until golden
Serve with mayonnaise, lemon, and chicken spice

name: Chicken Caesar Salad
method: Cut the chicken into stripes
Dip each stripe into flour, then egg, and then breadcrumbs
Cut the romaine lettuce into square pieces and wash it thoroughly, then add to bowl
Add Caesar dressing to the bowl and croutons
Cut bacon in squares and in a heated pan cook until cooked, then add to bowl
In the same pan, cook the premade chicken stripes until golden
Mix the lettuce, bacon, Caesar sauce, and croutons in the bowl and add to plate
Add the chicken stripes on top and top up with grated Parmesan cheese and extra Caesar dressing if needed
(Optional) add anchovies if desired

name: Beef Steaks
method: Cut beef joint into steak cuts
Add salt and black pepper on both sides of each cut
In a pan, melt a teaspoon of butter
Place the meat cuts into the pan along with a branch of rosemary
Cook until a slight line of cooked meat is visible and rotate the meat, while also shaking the butter-rosemary mix
Repeat this process according to how you prefer the meat
Serve with granular or sea salt on top

name: Veggie Pure
method: Peel and slice the butternut squash into cubes (remove the seeds)
Slice the courgette into circles
Peel the carrot and onion and slice into appropriate cubes
Peel the sweet potatoes and slice them into cubes
Boil water in a big pot and add all the above plus one bag of spinach
When all vegetables are soft and cooked, drain the water
Using a blender, blend all the ingredients, adding a slice of cheese per blend or around 4-5 slices of cheese in total
Serve in a bowl with grilled bread and lemon

name: Tomato & Basil Soup
method: Chop fresh tomatoes into cubes
In a pan, add a bit of olive oil and cook onion until soft
Add carrot and sweet red pepper and cook until soft
Add veggie stock if desired and then add the tomatoes
Cut fresh basil and add to the mix along with a little boiling water
When tomatoes are cooked enough, turn off the heat and let it cool
Blend the mixture, adding a cheese slice to each blend
Serve with a lemon slice, croutons in the middle, a dash of oregano, a line of olive oil, and a leaf of basil on top for decoration

name: Scrambled Eggs
method: Crack 2-3 eggs into a bowl
Add garlic powder, salt, and black pepper, then mix well
In a pan, add a small cube of butter and the egg mixture, and keep mixing with a whisk or spatula
Remove from heat if eggs are hardening too fast and ensure eggs are cooked evenly as you scramble in the pan
Add feta cheese to the mixture and cook until hot
Serve with tomatoes and/or cucumber and bread

name: Omelet
method: For each omelet, crack one egg into a bowl
Add salt, black pepper, and garlic powder
Add butter to a heated pan and pour the egg mixture from the bowl, spreading evenly as if making pancakes
Once ready, flip the egg and add Gouda cheese slices and feta cheese to one half
Fold the egg (place the half with nothing on top of the half with cheeses)
Once cooked, remove from the pan and serve with tomatoes and bread

name: Fried Eggs
method: Preheat pan and add olive oil
Crack one egg over the oil and add salt
Once cooked, remove from the pan and enjoy on a sandwich or by itself

name: Gnocchi
method: In a preheated pan, add a dash of olive oil
Add onion, grated carrot, and celery, and cook until soft
Add tomato paste and chopped basil
Boil the gnocchi in a separate pot
When ready, drain from water and add to the first pot
Cook until all mixed well and hot
Serve with Parmesan on top and a basil leaf for decoration

name: Tartar sauce
method: Boil one egg and once ready, peel and mash well, then add to a bowl.
Slice 4/5 gherkins into tiny cubes and add to the bowl.
Add a couple of drops of Worcestershire sauce and a teaspoon of mustard.
Slice into small pieces two spoons of capers and add to the bowl.
Add a little bit of lemon juice, top up with mayonnaise, and complete with sliced dill.

name: Spicy sauce
method: Melt butter in a pan.
Add hot sauce, chili oil, or any equivalent hot sauce.
Add a tiny bit of cornflour and mix well.
Serve with red pepper or chives on top.

name: Buffalo sauce
ingredients: Half bottle of Frank's hot sauce
method: Melt half pack of butter.
Add half bottle of Frank's hot sauce.
Add a little bit of white wine vinegar.
Add a drop of Worcestershire sauce.
Add a little bit of garlic puree, lemon juice, and cornflour.
Mix well until smooth.

name: Garlic mayo sauce
method: Squeeze 1/2 cloves of garlic.
Add yogurt and mayonnaise in a ratio of 1:1.
Add dill and mix well.

name: Gochujang mayo sauce
method: Mix the gochujang paste with mayonnaise in a ratio of 1:2.
Add some chipotle and mix well.

name: Peas purée
method: Boil the peas until soft.
Add peas to blender alongside some water.
Add lemon juice and salt to taste.

name: Potato purée
method: Peel potatoes and cut them into medium-sized cubes.
Boil until soft.
Mash the potatoes and add butter and milk.
Add salt and black pepper to taste.
Add grated cheese and mix well.

name: Fried potatoes
method: Slice potato into long rectangles.
Heat oil in pan.
Deep fry potatoes until golden.

name: Green salad
method: Chop tomatoes and cucumber into mid-sized cubes.
Cut red onion into mid-sized cubes.
Dice parsley and add to the mix.
Optional: Dice pepper into cubes and add to the mix.
Add vinegar and olive oil and mix well.
Serve with grated feta cheese on top and olive and parsley branch for decoration.

name: Rice
method: Measure the desired amount of rice and wash it thoroughly.
Prepare a 1.8:1 water-to-rice ratio and add to a pot.
Add the cleaned rice, a spoon of butter, and a pinch of salt to the pot and bring to a boil.
When the water boils, decrease the heat.
Add more water if needed, and once the rice is soft, turn off the heat and mix well.

name: Asparagus
method: Wash the asparagus and peel the bottom part slightly with a peeler.
Cut off a finger of the bottom, as this part is hard and uneatable.
Boil water in a pot.
Once the water is boiling, turn off the heat and add the asparagus.
Cover the pot with cling film and steam the asparagus for about 5 minutes or until soft.
Serve steamed, or add lemon and butter for extra flavor.
Add sea salt flakes to taste.

name: Broccoli
method: Wash the broccoli and cut off a finger space of their tail.
Add water to a pot and bring to a boil.
Add the broccoli to the boiling water and cook until softened.
Turn off the heat once the broccoli is tender.
Enjoy plain or add butter and lemon for extra flavor.

name: Bok Choy
method: Wash and slice off the tail of the bok choy in a triangular shape.
Bring water to a boil in a pot and add the bok choy.
Cook until soft, then turn off the heat.
Season with garlic powder and salt, and serve hot.

name: Green Beans
method: Wash the green beans and remove the tails.
Add water to a pot and bring to a boil.
Add the green beans and cook until soft.
Serve hot.

name: Grilled Aubergine
method: Wash the aubergine and slice in half, then slice each half into four pieces.
Place the aubergine pieces in a bowl and add salt, then mix well.
In a heated pan, place the pieces down on one side.
When almost black, flip to the other side.
When almost black, place on the skin part and press to squeeze the juice.
After a longer time, flip to the front and take out.
Remove the skin from the precooked aubergines and dice them into cubes.
In a pan, add a drop of oil and cook onion until soft.
Add garlic and fresh tomatoes diced in cubes.
Add basil and the diced aubergines, and cook until hot.
In an oven-suitable bowl, add the mix, add drops of cheese, and cover with egg.
Bake for 10 minutes at 230°C.

name: Spinach
method: Wash and boil spinach for 5-10 mins.
Drain spinach from water and put in bowl.
Add grated cheese and a few drops of milk and salt.
Blend until all is mixed well.
Serve hot (reheat if needed).

name: Corn
method: Cut corn in half and cut each half into four pieces.
In a heated pan, add butter and salt and add each corn piece.
Grill until there's a little char on the corn and enjoy.

name: Potato Salad
method: Wash and peel potatoes.
Cut potatoes into squares and boil until cooked.
Mash the potatoes in a bowl and add black pepper.
Add sliced leek, feta cheese, mayonnaise, and gherkins sliced into cubes.
Optional: Add milk and mozzarella if desired.

name: Tolumbi
method: Prepare the syrup by boiling 750g water and 500g sugar with vanilla essence, and let it cool when it boils; stop it.
Prepare the batch for the Tolumbi by adding 250g of water and a drop of oil to a pot.
Add salt and sugar pinch, and bring to boil.
When boiled, add a bucket of flour and start mixing.
When mixed properly, leave to cool down.
When cooled, add 5 eggs one by one, ensuring they are mixed properly without flour collections.
The batch is then added to boiling oil and fried.
After being fried, each is dipped into the syrup liquid for a couple of seconds and placed in a tray to chill.

name: Grilled Pasta
method: Boil the pasta until it's almost cooked.
Prepare the mix with 5 eggs, 200g sugar, vanilla essence, and 1 liter milk and mix well.
Place the pasta and the mix in a tray and bake in the oven at 180°C until crispy on top.
